players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Observing the game, I haven't seen any suspicious behavior yet...."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out today to keep the town safe."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso, Bob is trying to shift blame without proof."
You: "Alice is innocent, and Bob's accusation seems rushed. Let's focus on gathering more clues before voting to avoid losing a town member unnecessarily."
Diana: "I think Bob's accusation is unfounded. We should wait and gather more evidence before making any decisions to avoid a wrongful vote."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I have solid proof from my investigation last night. Waiting will only give her more time to manipulate and kill. We must vote her out now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Observing the game, I haven't seen any suspicious behavior yet...."
You: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out today to keep the town safe."

Alice: "Alice is innocent, and Bob's accusation seems rushed. Let's focus on gathering more clues before voting to avoid losing a town member unnecessarily."
Diana: "I think Bob's accusation is unfounded. We should wait and gather more evidence before making any decisions to avoid a wrongful vote."
You: "Alice is the mafioso. I have solid proof from my investigation last night. Waiting will only give her more time to manipulate and kill. We must vote her out now."
